mapper.select: SELECT distinct rt.C_TABLE, rt.C_COLUMN, rt.C_SQL, rt.C_STATUS, rt.C_ORDER FROM ( SELECT t3.C_TABLE, t3.C_NAME as C_COLUMN, t3.C_SQL, t3.C_STATUS, t3.C_ORDER FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS_SPCL t, SYS_DATA_PERMS_SPCL_ROLE_REL t2, SYS_DATA_PERMS_SPCL_COLUMNS t3 WHERE t.T_ID = t2.T_ID AND t.T_ID = t3.T_ID AND t2.R_ID = #{rid} AND t.T_STATUS = 1 AND t3.C_STATUS = 1 UNION ALL SELECT t3.C_TABLE, t3.C_NAME as C_COLUMN, t3.C_SQL, t3.C_STATUS, t3.C_ORDER FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS_SPCL t, SYS_DATA_PERMS_SPCL_USER_REL t2, SYS_DATA_PERMS_SPCL_COLUMNS t3 WHERE t.T_ID = t2.T_ID AND t.T_ID = t3.T_ID AND t2.U_ID = #{uid} AND t.T_STATUS = 1 AND t3.C_STATUS = 1 ) rt

SELECT t.P_ID, t.P_NAME, t.P_TYPE, t.P_INTRO, (SELECT x.T_TABLE FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS_TABLE x WHERE x.T_ID = t.P_TABLE) as P_TABLE, t.P_RELATION, t.P_STATUS, t.P_ORDER FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS t, SYS_DATA_PERMS_GROUP_REL t2, SYS_DATA_PERMS_GROUP_ROLE_REL t3 WHERE t.P_ID = t2.P_ID AND t2.G_ID = t3.G_ID AND t3.R_ID = #{rid} AND t.P_STATUS = 1 UNION ALL SELECT t.P_ID, t.P_NAME, t.P_TYPE, t.P_INTRO, (SELECT x.T_TABLE FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS_TABLE x WHERE x.T_ID = t.P_TABLE) as P_TABLE, t.P_RELATION, t.P_STATUS, t.P_ORDER FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS t, SYS_DATA_PERMS_GROUP_REL t2, SYS_DATA_PERMS_GROUP_USER_REL t3 WHERE t.P_ID = t2.P_ID AND t2.G_ID = t3.G_ID AND t3.U_ID = #{uid} AND t.P_STATUS = 1 UNION ALL SELECT t.P_ID, t.P_NAME, t.P_TYPE, t.P_INTRO, (SELECT x.T_TABLE FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS_TABLE x WHERE x.T_ID = t.P_TABLE) as P_TABLE, t.P_RELATION, t.P_STATUS, t.P_ORDER FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS t, SYS_DATA_PERMS_ROLE_REL t2 WHERE t.P_ID = t2.P_ID AND t2.R_ID = #{rid} AND t.P_STATUS = 1 UNION ALL SELECT t.P_ID, t.P_NAME, t.P_TYPE, t.P_INTRO, (SELECT x.T_TABLE FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS_TABLE x WHERE x.T_ID = t.P_TABLE) as P_TABLE, t.P_RELATION, t.P_STATUS, t.P_ORDER FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS t, SYS_DATA_PERMS_USER_REL t2 WHERE t.P_ID = t2.P_ID AND t2.U_ID = #{uid} AND t.P_STATUS = 1

SELECT t.P_ID, t.I_ID, NVL((SELECT t.C_NAME FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS_TABLE_COLUMNS t WHERE t.C_ID = t.I_COLUMN),t.I_COLUMN) as I_COLUMN, t.I_NAME, t.I_PINYIN, t.I_CONDITION, t.I_PERMS, t.I_STATUS, t.I_ORDER FROM SYS_DATA_PERMS_ITEM t WHERE t.P_ID = #{pid} AND t.I_STATUS = 1 ORDER By t.I_ORDER ASC
